"It's always the case that I don't want to go to the end of the sentence before the sound.
It's a man and a woman who fiddle with each other.
Why is it that sound isn't sound and form isn't form?
Does it obtain by calling it sound?'
'I'll answer you, 'Can anyone understand what you're saying?'
'Since it's not the first sound and the last phrase, how does it enter?'
'You can't get sand in your eyes.
'You can't get water in your ears.'
"How is it that you can't get sand in your eyes and water in your ears?

source_sentence: 云如何是耳裏著水不得。
translation: How is it that you can't get water in your ear?'
The teacher asked if the mirror was clear.
'Even if there were, there's no work to do to extend it.'
'It's just that a drop of water and ice forms in the path.'
"A drop of water and ice will grow.
There's a part of the matter that's involved.'
"What does this person think will arise?
"He's on top of a high mountain.
There's nothing to share with the Way.
All things have the same origin.
That's what Mañjuśrī and Samantabhadra didn't ask.
"How is the Dharma that has the same origin?
"But you must ask about Mañjuśrī and Samantabhadra.
'One fishing trip and you're on top.'
"How is the meaning of not moving?
The bright moon rises above Kusumō.

source_sentence: 益州北院通禪師(凡四)師辭洞山。
translation: The master of the Northern Court of Yizhou, the Chan Master Tong (where there were four), left for Dongshan.
Shan said, "The flying monkeys have a high peak.
The teacher recited it in silence.
Why don't you go to the peak?
Here, the teacher had a thought.
He didn't go further up the mountain.
He saw and showed the crowd, saying.
"The master who sits there is cut off.
He didn't fall into the second view.
The teacher went out to the crowd and told them.
"You should know that there's one person who doesn't fit in with the others.
"He's still falling into the second view.
The teacher then overturned the rope bed.
He then said to the monk.
The teacher asked him about Sandwich Hill.
"There's nothing we can do at the moment.
It's not what the ear and eye see.
Isn't that what the monk said?
The teacher then lifted down the rope-bottomed monk's chair.
He stood with his arms folded.
He picked Shan up and beat him with his hands.
He struck him with a blow.
"Did you just knock down the rope bed?
You must wait until Jiashan gets up.
He'll hit him with a stick and get rid of him.
Where did he mean to go?
"The two dragons are fighting over the pearl.
"The one who gets it loses it.
What happens when you say it's not lost?
He asked what the patriarch's intention was when he came from the west.
"A dry pine is painted on the wall.
The bee comes and scrambles to pick the blossoms.

source_sentence: 洛京白馬遁儒禪師(凡一)師問僧。
translation: The Chan Master (Fan Yi) Baimaji Dunru of Luojing asked the monk.
'It's because the old monk doesn't know good from evil.'
How many people forget to talk about it here?
You must have the eyes of a monk to get it.
The monk wiped his sleeves and left.
The saṃgha turned his head back.
"These are words of bitterness and humility.
They shouldn't be difficult to utter.'

source_sentence: 明州天童咸啟禪師(凡二)僧問。
translation: The Chan Master Mingzhou Tiantong Xianqi (where two) asked the saṃgha.
He asked the master what he could do.
What's the point of asking him to do it?
'I'll just buy straw shoes and walk around.'
The master called out to the monk to come closer.
"It's just like the old monk who only faced this.
He said, "Where did Fulong come from?
They said they hadn't subdued this animal before.
The teacher said, "Go get some tea.
